response.explain: Since this is the first step, there is no previous error or code to explain. The task is to cook a garlic clove and place it on a plate with butter. The garlic clove and butter are both inside the fridge, which is currently closed. The first step should be to open the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the garlic clove
(3) Cook the garlic clove
(4) Take out the butter
(5) Put the cooked garlic clove and butter on the plate
response.code:
